Can you create a puzzle that involves creating a document on the advantages of homeschooling using LaTeX? Your task is to outline the key points for an essay that explores the benefits of homeschooling, including individualized education, flexible scheduling, and strong family relationships. However, you can only use a limited set of words in your outline, and each word can only be used once. Can you figure out the words you need and put them in the correct order to create a coherent and well-organized outline using proper formatting, including section headings and subheadings? Good luck! 
Word bank: introduction, several, advantages, homeschooling, individualized, education, flexible, scheduling, strong, family, relationships, conclusion, summarizing, benefits, proper, formatting, section, headings, subheadings.
